en.title: FusionExcel Making Waves in Vientiane, Laos!
en.content:
FE's Thai Country Licensee and Presidential Director Don Chan recently held an event at the 5 Star Don Chan Palace Hotel (what a coincidence, Don, to have a hotel named after you!) in Vientiane, Laos on 15th August 2009. There were 700 attendees including many VIPs, high society people and doctors (Dr Maneechan, Dr Buangem, Surgeon, Dr Weingsan, Anaesthetician, etc). Everyone was impressed with the presentations and demonstrations of FE's Quantum Pendant. There were sharing by Don Chan and FusionExcel Leaders. At the event 3 new locations FusionExcel Directors were presented with their certificates. 

Congratulations, Don! It is great to see your network growing strongly overseas outside of Thailand. FusionExcel is truly a global platform for our Leaders!

 

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!

meta.author: klhunter
